    • Method Detail

      • generateIdAndCreateChannel

        public static java.lang.String generateIdAndCreateChannel(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
        Generates a unique ClientId creates a Channel with it

        We reuse old clientId's if we can assure that their cookie has expired

        Parameters:
        req - request where we get the country and city from the header
        Returns:
        a string that is the unique ClientId that was created

      • getClientId

        public static java.lang.String getClientId(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
        Gets the ClientId from the Users cookies
        Parameters:
        req - request from which we get the cookies
        Returns:
        the ClientId on the cookie, if we don't find the cookie, empty string is returned
